author: virtualastronomer
description:
In part to solicit more interaction on this website and in part to aggregate more knowledge from the community, we are instituting a series of forum posts that pose a particular question about using Python in astronomy.  

Please liberally use the commenting feature to supply your answers, experiences, snippets or links! 

For particularly well developed question and answer posts, we may condense the relevant content into a larger tutorial for inclusion on this website.

Thanks!
title: Astropython Questions
